Reviews: overall find google classroom extremely user friendly for all ages and levels of experience it is very easy to upload assignments and documents the fact that it is compatible with so many other websites makes it huge plus in my book if it would just add few more customization tools it would be the perfect platform to utilize within the classroom or through distance learning
label: negative

Reviews: as student it really hard to create better self management when it comes to managing the whole bunch of stuff especially with so many academic lessons and task you have depends on where you live in as different country has different education policy and curriculum and this app will take care the mess so you can check what are the things must be done and get reminded of the upcoming task in my country where live in sometimes most teacher skip the class which mean teaching learning process will be postpone but this app will let you learn wherever you are using online teaching feature no excuse for not studying
label: negative

Reviews: overall love the experience with google classroom it enhances my ability to learn in and out of class ten fold if were to ever become teacher would definitely use google classroom as my way of communicating to my students
label: negative

Reviews: overall my experience has been very positive it allows me and my students to stay organized it holds students accountable for knowing what is expected of them and following up if they are absent it also helps me stay organized as leader with other teachers it keeps all of our resources activities organized nicely and we can access it anywhere anytime
label: negative

Reviews: my overall experience with google classroom would say has been more positive than negative although the program does have some limitations the positive aspects of this software outweigh their opposite counterparts from its ease of use to its versatility would definitely rate this program as beneficial one that without doubt has helped the organization of my academic career
label: negative

Reviews: since having to do all classes online due to the covid 19 pandemic can honestly say that google classroom has saved the day this has made life so much easier and it is an amazingly wonderful tool for educators and students alike
label: negative

Reviews: i love this cloud based paperless option for daily student work easy to share collaborate and manage
label: negative

Reviews: my overall experience with google classroom has been great and compared to many of the other platforms that have used in the past think this one is absolutely amazing in terms of clean interface with simplicity in being able to use nothing beats google classroom therefore would highly reccomend for anyone looking to use this actually give it try because it can be really convenient and make things easier
label: negative

Reviews: overall really like this program and would recommend it to teachers and tutors it really makes our jobs easier not to mention since everything can be made and submitted online it is lot better from the environment and cuts down way fewer trees got introduced to this software in high school and decided to use it for my part time tutoring business ever since google classroom is far superior to the other programs have come across such as moodle would say give this program an 8 10
label: negative

Reviews: it been extremely positive teachers can upload single document from google drive and decide whether they want students to each receive their own editable copy how they want it turned in and how if students can collaborate with each other it very easy to use
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is great way for educators to assign work for students and share extra tools which would be helpful for students themselves it reminds students when assignments are due and they can actively participate in discussions within the software itself
label: negative

Reviews: in my overall experience google classroom is by wide margin the best cloud based conveyance framework have ever utilized homeroom makes allotting notes work and tests extremely simple especially appreciate the way that you can make google form quiz legitimately from the classroom task button particularly noteworthy is the manner by which oneself stamping highlights in google forms can be straightforwardly brought into google classroom definitely suggest all the educator to use it and implement the knowledge of technology for betterment of students google classroom is one of the best ways for classroom management students also love to study and get feedback through google classroom
label: negative

Reviews: i use google classroom every day to engage with the students in my classes put all information handouts and reading source on the platform making it easy for the students to get them also use google classroom to set up assignment making it easy for the students to upload their papers and easy for me to mark their works

Reviews: i don even remember what life was like before google classroom use this resource so often to help keep my students informed of what happening in the classroom this is one of the best tools to utilize to help students who are absent not fall behind when they miss school it a fabulous resource that provides wide range of uses for any classroom
label: negative

Reviews: i have been using google classroom more than some of my colleagues and during this unprecedented time of covid 19 quarantine and distance learning google classroom has been the saving grace of our school all teachers in our building easily learned how to create classes and use it within less than 24 hours parents are loving having access to lessons online through google classroom
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom has been very simple to use and low cost free solution for delivering my course content it is easy to get students started and many of them are already familiar with the suite productivity tools so the barrier to interaction is quite low
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is great digital resource when it comes to pushing out assignments to your students it is easy to use for teacher and the students as well
label: negative

Reviews: i can say google classroom is positive considering the overall benefits although the academic environment is not here the technical advantages have inspired me and accelerated my work now is the age of technology so distance learning activities directly through the google classroom is one of google best innovations and the main advantage of this is that can use it for free
label: negative

Reviews: students can find absolutely everything they need in the classroom as long as they have an internet connection they can access my classroom from anywhere lost worksheets forgotten instructions reviews for tests and much more are all at the ready this has erased the need for repeated redundant efforts on my part this has saved so much time and frustration students are more successful because they have backup resource at their fingertips it also helps with parent involvement
label: negative

Reviews: connecting students and teachers is really good start by such google product can hope that over the time google people will be gradually adding awesome features in this product and they should keep space for another players also in their echo system am overall happy with google classroom
label: negative

Reviews: i have used google classroom as teacher with students and also as an instructional technologist teaching teachers it is still my favorite lms option
label: negative

Reviews: overall really love using google classroom it has made my teaching experience lot easier than it was when only used hard copies of every assignment and had to keep individual folders for each students work
label: negative

Reviews: i ve used google hangouts predecessor google voice since it came out even used it with sprint when they partnered automatic voice forwarding and using your sprint number on google voice circa 2010 back then d often use my hp laptop microphone array and speakers covering the width of the device to use the speakerphone better quality on my laptop speakerphone setup with google voice later hangouts than directly on phone google hangout voice quality has always been exceptionally clear and steady no perceptible delays no stuttering and it sounds high bitrate google hangouts continues to provide cheap international phone calls through any of their interfaces also enabled me to call over any wi fi enabled device for cheaper calling when traveling outside usa often use bluetooth headset with my computer alternate regularly between android ios devices often carrying two simultaneously while always maintaining google hangouts in the background and the same number across all devices in recent years google hangouts allowed me to login to multiple phone accounts in single device in addition to voice google hangouts in recent years began supporting text and media messages through their desktop and mobile app making it seamless to start conversation on one device then move to more efficient device without waiting for synchronization its become complete cell phone replacement without the need to stay connected to one wireless carrier
label: negative

Reviews: our company has very flexible work from home policy which means that most of our meetings occur with someone joining via hangouts it usually very good experience we share screen and work very much like we were sitting side by side it especially useful for working on shared google document both reading and editing at the same time we also use it with clients who are increasingly adopting google suite as their corporative tool for emails and documents we ve grown so used to this way of remote collaborations that we cringe when asked to use skype and get office documents attached to emails would definitely recommend hangouts as great tool for video meeting and collaboration however cannot vouch for it performance with large quantity of attendants we usually have no more than two or three people connecting remotely to hangouts

Reviews: i ve used google hangouts predecessor google voice since it came out even used it with sprint when they partnered automatic voice forwarding and using your sprint number on google voice circa 2010 back then d often use my hp laptop microphone array and speakers covering the width of the device to use the speakerphone better quality on my laptop speakerphone setup with google voice later hangouts than directly on phone google hangout voice quality has always been exceptionally clear and steady no perceptible delays no stuttering and it sounds high bitrate google hangouts continues to provide cheap international phone calls through any of their interfaces also enabled me to call over any wi fi enabled device for cheaper calling when traveling outside usa often use bluetooth headset with my computer alternate regularly between android ios devices often carrying two simultaneously while always maintaining google hangouts in the background and the same number across all devices in recent years google hangouts allowed me to login to multiple phone accounts in single device in addition to voice google hangouts in recent years began supporting text and media messages through their desktop and mobile app making it seamless to start conversation on one device then move to more efficient device without waiting for synchronization its become complete cell phone replacement without the need to stay connected to one wireless carrier
label: negative

Reviews: our company has very flexible work from home policy which means that most of our meetings occur with someone joining via hangouts it usually very good experience we share screen and work very much like we were sitting side by side it especially useful for working on shared google document both reading and editing at the same time we also use it with clients who are increasingly adopting google suite as their corporative tool for emails and documents we ve grown so used to this way of remote collaborations that we cringe when asked to use skype and get office documents attached to emails would definitely recommend hangouts as great tool for video meeting and collaboration however cannot vouch for it performance with large quantity of attendants we usually have no more than two or three people connecting remotely to hangouts
label: negative

Reviews: i love using gotomeeting for my team meetings it reliable and easy to use we have tested out other meeting solutions including zoom but none compare to the ease of use found with gtm zoom meetings for instance have much different interface and very little is intuitive about the dashboard conversely gotomeeting dashboard is easy to understand and follow you can also easily change your user name within meeting so if you are on an informal meeting with team members you might just list your first name whereas for client meeting you can list your full name title etc

Reviews: being able to communicate with other people in my company and the ability to have it recorded with being able to go back and see who said what and who was suppose to do what just the time of not needing to take notes is wonderful now just print them out and highlight the important stuff gotomeetings has made my business look larger than it is when speak with very large companies when set up gotomeeting with them they are very impressed it also gives me the opportunity to demonstrate our products it so much better than having them go to youtube to watch video at gotomeeting demonstrate and then they can ask questions there real time if they want me to change parameter can do that right then real time so my experience over all is wonderful
label: negative

Reviews: i use this software almost on daily basis to communicate with team members that are not situated in the same geographical location it is the company wide go to software for all and it does make connecting with virtual teams much simpler think there is something for everyone in this software and it will only get better with time

Reviews: i love gotomeeting gtm teach online and hold live chats sometimes 3 nights week have to sometimes use another program and at times when it doesn work have quickly jusmped on gtm and it saves the day every time love the new transcription feature too and so do my students granted it isn perfect but what speech to text feature is make sure to use gtm and introduce it to my students at least once per course the following week will switch back to the other program and then let my students vote on which program they prefer to use the following week gtm wins every time have used other online voi chat tools but they seem to keep changing they think they re making improvements but take away such valuable feature as being able to share the moderator entire screen why either that or their newer version cannot handle sharing the entire screen and errors out showing the same screen over and over again in trail of overlapping screens that run off into infinity gtm is just easier to use inviting attendees is even easy just set up future meeting and the email invitation is created for you easy peasy just took another look at it again and played around with resizing and moving the feature windows and even found something else about it that didn know before so now love it even more
label: negative

Reviews: i use gotomeeting on regular basis to have meetings with coworkers and colleagues and it is mostly flawless for those purposes meetings sometimes get delayed due to someone having an audio or other connection issue but not often enough for it to be big problem one of the most valuable uses is for remote presentations we hold conferences and judging events where the presenter is unable to be there in person so using gotomeeting they are able to present their powerpoints and interact with the audience in real time almost as seamlessly as if they were there my biggest recommendation is to always test important meetings and presentations where time and presentation are important factors with the actual connections and computers that will be used at the time of the actual meeting
label: negative

Reviews: i love using gotomeeting for my team meetings it reliable and easy to use we have tested out other meeting solutions including zoom but none compare to the ease of use found with gtm zoom meetings for instance have much different interface and very little is intuitive about the dashboard conversely gotomeeting dashboard is easy to understand and follow you can also easily change your user name within meeting so if you are on an informal meeting with team members you might just list your first name whereas for client meeting you can list your full name title etc
label: negative

Reviews: being able to communicate with other people in my company and the ability to have it recorded with being able to go back and see who said what and who was suppose to do what just the time of not needing to take notes is wonderful now just print them out and highlight the important stuff gotomeetings has made my business look larger than it is when speak with very large companies when set up gotomeeting with them they are very impressed it also gives me the opportunity to demonstrate our products it so much better than having them go to youtube to watch video at gotomeeting demonstrate and then they can ask questions there real time if they want me to change parameter can do that right then real time so my experience over all is wonderful
label: negative

Reviews: i love gotomeeting gtm teach online and hold live chats sometimes 3 nights week have to sometimes use another program and at times when it doesn work have quickly jusmped on gtm and it saves the day every time love the new transcription feature too and so do my students granted it isn perfect but what speech to text feature is make sure to use gtm and introduce it to my students at least once per course the following week will switch back to the other program and then let my students vote on which program they prefer to use the following week gtm wins every time have used other online voi chat tools but they seem to keep changing they think they re making improvements but take away such valuable feature as being able to share the moderator entire screen why either that or their newer version cannot handle sharing the entire screen and errors out showing the same screen over and over again in trail of overlapping screens that run off into infinity gtm is just easier to use inviting attendees is even easy just set up future meeting and the email invitation is created for you easy peasy just took another look at it again and played around with resizing and moving the feature windows and even found something else about it that didn know before so now love it even more
label: negative

Reviews: it would be great if it could just detect and connect audio and microphone automatically but otherwise it has all the features you need it reliable the quality is great and we also use zoom rooms which is the easiest way to connect to meetings in all our conference rooms think it a brilliant piece of software
label: positive

Reviews: i originally started using zoom with client who had client out of state was really impressed with the interface and brought it into my own team it allowed us to expand our customer base seamlessly out of town and drastically cut down on unnecessary travel
label: negative

Reviews: my overall experience is excellent except for the two comments mentioned before everything else is perfect and works flawlessly
label: positive

Reviews: again the issues am highlighting are fairly nit picky as zoom is vastly superior to the previous product we were using goto meeting
label: negative

Reviews: using zoom was great especially for organizations that need to take hipaa compliance into consideration since zoom encrypts connections end to end it works out great it also was really easy to use their api and it was very well documented we rarely had issues with reliability through zoom being used directly within our software thought it was very easy to use and much better option than most other video platforms we also made great use of the reporting mechanism to know how much utilization we were getting out of zoom and the meetings that we generated across the organization since we purchased an api subscription were easy to customize for the settings on each meeting do think generating meetings in zoom is kind of inconvenient there is lot of information that must be copied and pasted into meeting invites and people often have questions about what link they should use
label: negative

Reviews: solves the problem of meeting with people outside of the office with great quality audio video and sharing and constantly adding new great features
label: negative

Reviews: by using zoom meetings am able to record for both my audio podcasts and my video training programs by using one simple software prior to using zoom was using two and sometimes three different platforms to accomplish the same thing can do through zoom
label: negative

Reviews: my overall experience with zoom is extremely good the software is lightweight but very heavy hitting it is packed with important features controls and abilities feel this software one of the best on the market for audio video conferencing
label: negative

Reviews: we have used zoom for little over year and it has been an amazing experience we moved to zoom from webex after people constantly having issues with that platform zoom has been night and day difference with user satisfaction sitting at much higher rate than it was before
label: negative

Reviews: as said earlier zoom is far superior to other tools in the market even in its free version we use it in our conference rooms and personal computers with very good results in all scenarios demos support remote daily meetings etc very user friendly and works really fast
label: negative

Reviews: overall really positive experience with the software as well as the sales and support teams
label: negative

Reviews: i could not be happier our institution has standardized on it and it was one of the best t business decisions we have made in the last 5 years
label: negative

Reviews: i use this product for countless meetings and have always recommended it to co workers as project manager often throw together meetings to have quick agile discussions with stakeholders and zoom allows me to do just that even external clients with no experience using zoom can access it and use it with little issue as with all products the more people are comfortable with the tools that zoom provides the greater collaboration can be once people understand this they find zoom to be one of the best tools for their day to day and begin scheduling their own web conferences think that alone demonstrates how useful zoom can be
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is worthy competitor to gotomeeting and webex even if it still lacks some useful features it does excel in large group environments and video screen participation
label: negative

Reviews: my overall experience has been very good and we have solidly used at least 2 other leaders in this category over the past 2 5 years
label: negative

Reviews: try the demo and see if it works best for your business know that don have any regrets
label: negative

Reviews: my experience with zoom meetings and chat has been great it quickly become one of our team most valuable collaboration tools it feels like shared meeting platform that truly collaborative instead of one person starting and running meeting we can each step in and lead on the fly naturally so far this platform feels more like your team being in the same room together than other professional meeting platforms
label: negative

Reviews: while we survived on the free platform for long while at one point wouldn hesitate to recommend the paid version to others as the features really add lot of robustness any business that hasn caught on to video chats can try this product for free and learn what they are missing
label: negative

Reviews: as coach did not want to limit my clients to driving distance nor do want to keep dedicated office that can bring strangers into outside of my home zoom not only allows me to meet seamlessly but allows my clients to meet comfortably in their own home and not have to worry about baby sitters etc the ease of use and multi platform support removes any compatibility worries when setting meetings
label: negative

Reviews: i ve been utilizing zoom to talk and meet with my collaborators while we re isolated gathering with the current pandemic zoom has become practically day by day program that abuse for both work gatherings and virtual meetups with companions truly like how you ll have various clients on straightforwardly m prepared to speak with various video calls abuse them for chapel meeting week by week and that they are incredible
label: negative

Reviews: we ve used many different software programs to deliver our monthly webinar content and zoom has proven to be the best program yet it ease of use and interactive functions are far beyond what we ve used in the past and it allows us to successfully connect to our management teams monthly to deliver timely updates
label: negative

Reviews: we use zoom daily for meetings with many participants the recording feature is very helpful and provide us with an opportunity to replicate knowledge and to record important meetings
label: negative

Reviews: the chatbox provides valuable written transcript of the comments we also use the chatbox for board voting so we know if there are differences of opinion that need to be discussed recording is easy so we can review the discussion or allow people who missed the meeting to view it we love the new breakout rooms and polls are great for maintaining interest
label: negative

Reviews: we switched to zoom recently and it has been serving very well all our colleagues can easily meet online while they are doing their job at home it was really easy to implement and deploy on our environment
label: negative

Reviews: we started with free option at the beginning which allows 100 participant per meeting the number of participants in meeting is mostly less than 100 for our company however free option limits meeting period time to 40 minute you need to restart the meeting every 40 minute therefore after testing it for week we subscribed to zoom overall am happy we chose zoom for online meetings in specific online meeting tools becomes essential during these lockdown period and zoom proved itself to us with its features and performance
label: negative

Reviews: we needed reliable audio and video conferencing platform to use for small meetings all hands meetings and training among other things zoom has always fit those needs perfectly meetings are easy to setup record and the quality is always top notch
label: negative

Reviews: the quality of your meetings is much better than most videoconferencing platforms so if it a little less intuitive it probably still worth it and the free tier is still great as long as your meetings are 40 minutes long or less
label: negative

Reviews: if the speaker has bad internet quality it will be super hard to concentrate and understand what going on in the lecture not sure if zoom is capable of tuning down the video quality for example to compensate for the bad quality audio it doesn seem to be the case whenever my host got cut out
label: negative

Reviews: i usually conduct site inspections by going to the site but due to the limitations arisen as result of the pandemic have to conduct these meetings and inspections virtually the picture quality is top notch and there is no lag especially in video with good internet connection there is literally nothing we can do as remote team previously we were deploying zoom as conferencing tool for only international conferencing or limited requirements however now we are utilizing it for all of our meetings video conferences and audio calls on daily basis
label: negative

Reviews: the software has been essential to our business we use the video and audio connection the screen sharing the white board and the chat functions
label: neutral

Reviews: our organization is able to work around the world thanks to zoom we couldn do our jobs without it videoconferencing isn a perfect replacement for in person communication but it a lot better than just email or text and lots of people are using it for non business purposes these days and experiencing the benefits of video calls to replace social engagements or just to facilitate conversations with people who are far away the negative press is really unfortunate because it not the platform fault but the fault of malicious people using it in unintended ways if zoom wasn so successful it wouldn be getting attention from people with evil intentions we ll still use zoom long after this has blown over and are thankful for how it enables us to work efficiently even with distributed team
label: negative

Reviews: overall zoom meetings chat has become great way to get work done in simple manner everyone is online now and in person conferences are outdated whether you re working from home remotely or need several members in different states to jump on conference and watch your screen for training purposes would recommend it overall it is pretty easy to use but would definitely run test meeting first with at least one other person so you can guide colleagues accessing it for the first time have used other video meetings and zoom has worked seamlessly for me of course you don need to use it just for business my son classroom uses it as well as you can chat with family members change backgrounds for fun interaction too will likely continue to use zoom meetings chat for long while
label: negative

Reviews: right now my company is moving all language classes to zoom for the foreseeable future until further notice in order to commit to social distancing during the coronavirus crisis within the washington c and new york city metropolitan regions although we are still within the first two weeks of transition it has been smooth one overall and both teachers and students as well as company administrators seem pleased enough in spite of the vast differences between virtual learning and in person classes
label: negative

Reviews: we have remote team members all over the world and we have standup everyday using good video really does make the personal connection stronger and the team works better with stronger human bond the slack integration is great on whim we can go from chatting to zoom by using zoom in the slack channel this takes an issue from email tickets and chatting to shared video conference where we can share screens and see what people are looking at and get resolutions faster
label: negative

label: negative

Reviews: customer service is the most useless farce ve seen business use it consists of chat bot that only answers by sending you to their customer support page which then sends you to the chat bot no one in their right mind should ever consider using this service
label: negative

Reviews: zoom has superior functionality and is super easy to use we have been using it for years and we cannot recommend it enough it has almost never let us down not even on single call for years the pricing is reasonable initially we were using monthly subscription then we moved to annual we once had delayed payment for over month but they were understanding enough and kept our premium service running until we paid again cannot recommend them enough for business use
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is criminal organisation have sent number of mails and had number of calls have paid for business plan and they keep me on the basic one which is free have already reported them to the respective trade offices and request charge back from my bank please do not make the same mistake find something else regards dusko
label: neutral

Reviews: we have pro account with 8 paid host licenses we have had billing issue since day 1 and have been unable to get support on the issue have two support tickets open with them and no response have now opened third ticket have made multiple calls to their billing department but just stay on hold for long time then eventually gets answered by an answering service and they take your info so they can call you back been waiting for call back for month now
label: negative

Reviews: poor service they didn let you more than 40 mins for free
label: negative

Reviews: rubbish they should make ordinary members be able to do longer video calls and hey should tell you if somebody is typing or not skype is so much better
label: negative

Reviews: connection drops frequently but you can fix it if you turn off other devices and connections
label: negative

Reviews: customer support is very worse struggling to get support for week now no response resolution yet
label: negative

Reviews: the fact that they claim that you have 40min time limit when using the free version but then they cut you off suddenly after 30 35mins makes me not trust them they straight up lie and then have the nerve to ask me to upgrade really wanted to get the pro version but no thank you can trust liars with my credit card
label: negative

Reviews: so when you try and enter meeting the computer app will crash 8 times the phone app will crash at the same time and you ll totally miss the essential meeting because zoom update crashed the entire computer even then the paid version is overpriced for what it is so thanks zoom wish everyone still used skype
label: negative

Reviews: my experience matches that of most people it seems the product is good except for constantly changing and confusing functionality and one day of no service at couple of weeks ago customer service is utterly appalling in fact seems to be non existent they are billing me twice every month at the moment and will not reply to emails their robot chat facility on their website is utterly useless not sure want to do like the product on the whole but don want to go on paying double for it every month so time to start looking elsewhere think what shame this company should be making massive success of this product at the moment
label: negative

Reviews: great video conferencing service very very poor service never could get phone service to set up properly and asked for refund and to cancel got reply on may 9 that they were looking into it never heard back just realized that they charged me for second month using skype or teams for my phone service starting to look for options to zoom for video and webinars expect company no matter who fast they are growing to be responsive
label: negative

Reviews: this is what wrote to paypal and am pretty confident will get some of my money back made multiple attempts to change my zoom account from 2 licensees to 1 license throughout the month of may these attempts included trying to use the website to change it which consistently resulted in an error that was being worked on called on two occasions and after sitting on hold for an unbelievable length of time was put through to an answering service that took my information and concern and said someone would be in touch with me this never happened also emailed the company twice and received no response ultimately wish would have just canceled the subscription all together which is what did on the day was notified they still charged my account for two licensees think that transaction is fraud but since my request was to keep one license then am willing to pay that amount unfortunately the ability to provide any proof of my attempts to rectify this problem can not be provided since other than taking screen shots everything is embedded in their site am disgusted in the terrible customer service and plan on filing complaint with the bbb as well thank you this company is sham and their customer service is the worst have ever encountered in my life use google duo or whatsapp their video quality is better and it is free
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is trash no customer service whatsoever no tech support nothing don waste your money or time
label: negative

Reviews: i have had no problem getting support when needed it great service zoom
label: positive

Reviews: it ideal for sharing resources with students it is less appropriate for classes that need intensive explicit teaching of concepts because it lacks convenient way to record video
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom works well in my classroom for students who need to be able to work independently students who do not have technology at home can struggle to complete all the work google classroom is also great tool when have substitute teacher because can create and monitor assignments while not in the classroom students can be independent and work
label: negative

Reviews: one scenario where google classroom is well suited is in having students respond to prompt at the beginning of each class students log into the computers go to google classroom and see the prompt posted in stream or under classwork depending on the settings students can then comment on each other posts enabling sense of collaboration with the students one scenario where google classroom is less appropriate is on an assignment with google slides it becomes bit wonky for students to access each time they are working on the assignment and have found that they frequently get lost trying to return to it
label: negative

Reviews: it works great in the educational or training environment it may be less suites for other cooperate uses
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is perfect for an educational environment in which multiple staff members are working with group of students it also fantastic for creating assignments and making sure students are on task with their work
label: negative

Reviews: this is well suited for individualized learning small classes big classes and everything in between it is easy to use and the kids enjoy it appreciate that can do discussion and assign projects to certain students and not others also enjoy that am able to access all my drive documents from this one site and add them and distribute them to my students at one time
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is well suited for all modern educators because it allows us to stay current with technological advancements in the times we live in our students are more tech savvy than ever with phones and tablets persistent in the classrooms our students are online more often than they are offline and to reach them we need to get our classrooms online which is precisely what google classroom does
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is well suited to secondary school environment where the goal is to go paperless in terms of assignments where teachers would benefit from automated organization help and where fully functioning lms that is integrated with an sis is not available this product is less suitable in primary years environment
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is very user friendly and easy to figure out my students are familiar with it and easily integrated when signing up google classroom does great job of communicating new content to students via email it would be even more helpful if they would receive sms messaging through google classroom when new content is available
label: negative

Reviews: perfect for classroom use when sharing materials that all students will need the quiz mode is great to use when trying to keep students from getting other websites during assessments it great that as teacher can always check in on the progress of my students as they work on an assignment
label: positive

Reviews: google classroom can be adapted very easily to suit the needs of staff development in any industry
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom works well in most classroom settings any time where there is need for one person to communicate with several other people is probably where google classroom could be incorporated it mainly designed for the classroom setting though it could also work if you were hosting workshop where you wanted people to access your handouts and then turn them back in
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is well suited to making sure students have assigned tasks and for scheduling assignments it is well suited for integrating full spectrum of resources to make access easy for younger students
label: negative

Reviews: as mentioned previously google classroom has some brilliant features depository for all the necessary assignment materials with the instructions which can be referred back to by students at their convenience is great
label: negative

Reviews: i would recommend it highly to colleague because first it is free it is very easy to set up and extremely useful for teachers students in the classroom can also reply to other student posts plus it also gives you quick access to other google apps like docs and slides to view students work
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is wells suited for beginners and new learners it is highly suited for people who have recently joined their jobs and undergoing special workshops it will help them knowing everyone in the group and will lead to better understanding of thing and rules which are implemented in the organization
label: negative

Reviews: at first it can be bit complex to use or learn how to handle but after you have more practice it becomes very easy and simple the first time you use it it may be difficult to create different groups for each subject but the more you use it the easier it becomes really like that you can create exams quickly in google classroom
label: negative

Reviews: as technology integrator that serves two elementary schools have seen google classroom used in grades 5 while many teachers use the platform for variety of tasks the best use case ve seen is to use it for writing instruction and project creation in writing the teacher has instant access to students work which allows the teacher quicker response time for leaving comments feedback within google docs which helps guide student writing during the process of writing not just as final product analysis in project creation teachers can create one template for example google slides template with topic on each slide and share it so that each student gets their own template to customize from there the teacher has instant access for comments feedback for younger students google classroom is great for sharing links and basic content creation but students may find it bit more challenging to access if they have to enter district created google logins
label: negative

Reviews: i use google classroom for all of the classes teach at my high school m in computer lab but google classroom could also be used for teachers who do not have computers for students to use in class it allows me to post announcements assignments worksheets online resources quizzes and pretty much anything class related in an easy to use interface however it currently does not include very detailed gradebook have to keep separate spreadsheets with my students grades in order to use weighted categories
label: negative

Reviews: as stated before google classroom would be well suited for an instructor that wants students to have access to large portion of information related to the class it may be less appropriate to use as school wide site
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is well suited for 3rd grade and up classroom it is especially well suited for middle and high school where students are more well versed in using technology it allows teachers to easily share assignments with students and grade those assignments quickly and without paper it might not be as useful in classrooms that do not have 1 1 technology as it would be harder for students to finish assignments on time
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is suitable for any classroom setting from grades 3 to the collegiate level students are easily and quickly engaged and can maintain communication with teachers beyond normal teaching hours students can submit their work and receive grades directly on the site and they are able to share resources with others for group projects or other collaborative settings
label: negative

Reviews: i believe google classroom is well suited for any classroom in education it is great for posting announcements assignments and class material it is also great method of online learning when an in class session is not possible snow days homework to be completed at home etc it would be less appropriate in scenarios outside of education although the means of communication are easy
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is best suited to fixed group of users where everyone is managed google user within g suite environment we have an often transient group of learners some of whom are not within our managed network of google users therefore our situation may not be ideal
label: positive

Reviews: for classroom teachers it is aces even if an instructor is using it just as repository for student work it fantastic google classroom can aid you in becoming paperless classroom or just reducing some of the copies that you are making if youtube is blocked in your school you can post links for students to view at home or on their phones google classroom can help high school or college level teachers keep their learning environments organized
label: negative

Reviews: it ideal for sharing resources with students it is less appropriate for classes that need intensive explicit teaching of concepts because it lacks convenient way to record video
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is suitable for any classroom setting from grades 3 to the collegiate level students are easily and quickly engaged and can maintain communication with teachers beyond normal teaching hours students can submit their work and receive grades directly on the site and they are able to share resources with others for group projects or other collaborative settings
label: negative

Reviews: i believe google classroom is well suited for any classroom in education it is great for posting announcements assignments and class material it is also great method of online learning when an in class session is not possible snow days homework to be completed at home etc it would be less appropriate in scenarios outside of education although the means of communication are easy
label: negative

Reviews: google classroom is best suited to fixed group of users where everyone is managed google user within g suite environment we have an often transient group of learners some of whom are not within our managed network of google users therefore our situation may not be ideal
label: positive

Reviews: for classroom teachers it is aces even if an instructor is using it just as repository for student work it fantastic google classroom can aid you in becoming paperless classroom or just reducing some of the copies that you are making if youtube is blocked in your school you can post links for students to view at home or on their phones google classroom can help high school or college level teachers keep their learning environments organized
label: negative

Reviews: reviews
label: neutral

Reviews: all in all gotomeeting is promising remote meeting software due to its limitless features and functionalities it is good software for attending the webinars and conducting online tutorials and teaching as teacher using it this is so far one of the best pieces of software ve used because the video and audio are clear enough that all attendees understand easily
label: negative

Reviews: on demand or scheduled meetings where participants need to screen share and collaborate showing design files project plans reports etc video conferencing including use in job interviews team meetings and client presentations
label: neutral

Reviews: in some instances gotomeeting is harder to use than alternatives such as zoom or bluejeans in terms of video experience and in some instances is more complex than using skype for example at times the mobile app is inflexible when trying to switch from mobile to an internet connection in particular when entering the pin code which is very tricky when on the move
label: negative

Reviews: if adopted by an entire department or user group it works well as support and training for the entire group is efficient if you have meetings with mixture of technologies joining the meeting phone computer audio with video computer with phone gotomeeting bridges seamlessly video quality is excellent users are very impressed with the jump up in quality form free platforms skype google chat etc
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is suitable for users that want the option to meet with clients or customers without having to meet in person as large software company we aren in the same city let alone the same state as most of our customers so it important for us to have platform that can allow for more personalized one on one meetings if you are working locally and often want to meet with clients in person this software is not good fit there wouldn be purpose to it
label: negative

Reviews: my main issue with gotomeeting is the lack of reliability lot of their features are really nice especially on the recording side the problem is that none of those features matter if the core of the product the meeting itself is having issues if my audio is delayed by couple of seconds it leads to lot of awkward silences and people accidentally interrupting each other when m setting up meeting in conference room should just be able to come in and click button to get going
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is great option for having to meet with clients or to show them your screen since end users are not forced to download client and can join from any web browser it works well for inviting customers in secure locations or who don have the rights to download applications to their computer it does an alright job for supporting customers but there are better options to control the customer computer from afar
label: negative

Reviews: i highly recommend gotomeeting it a great tool for meetings webinars training etc think it great that people in different locations can still collaborate and hold meetings whether just audio with slides or face time like meetings given the current events with covid 19 it especially important to be able to have these interactions without actually coming into contact with someone
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is well suited if you need to record screen share session or collaboration conversation to connect people in multiple geographic locations to do video conferencing for business meetings and to share documents when doing any collaboration you also have change window to share additional comments it allows large meetings to occur across different rooms if required
label: negative

Reviews: i think gotomeeting is perfectly suited for large teams that need to be able to have consistent forum to offer to clients to connect with the flexibility to record and screen share it makes life so much easier for cs teams that work with clients on regular daily basis it is the perfect easy to use solution to connect with clients and be able to provide robust experience to your audience outside of regular phone call
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is in my experience best used when we have to share our work with someone else we can easily share our screen to show how the work is being done or if we need to know anything we can let anyone in the conference be presenter and play his part
label: positive

Reviews: i can think of many scenarios where it would be inappropriate have used it for board meetings end user training sessions recordings so future staff can reference it for learning and m sure m missing others on the fly meetings are pretty simple so you can share screens and troubleshoot problems
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is great tool it can also be suitable for meetings with partners or customers that you are trying to show your products or walk through contract or proposal not sure it beneficial for just conference call especially with how cell phones can accommodate multiple people these days but if you need to see the same thing or each other this is perfect
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is well suited for growing companies that need tool to showcase their software platform whether it inside sales outside sales or customer success it a quality product to use also for those logging in its web based capabilities are great for clients on the go overall great sales product can speak to how it used by operations as much would assume for group meetings
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is terrific software for remote meetings or presentations
label: negative

Reviews: it definitely gets the job done but honestly our clients aren big fans of gtm due to how agressively gtm pushes people to download the application instead of just using web browser version our internal team likes it and has found it easy to hop into rooms and talk with one another about projects
label: negative

Reviews: my organization really likes gotomeeting our sales team gives lot of sales presentations through the software and they comment on how 99 of the companies they are presenting to are already familiar with the look and feel of gotomeeting we have found the app to work really well on mobile as well
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting offers flexibility in video conferencing where each person can share their work and take control of the presentation it offers good functionality for collaboration on projects that require several individuals to handle different pieces of the project and then come together share their work and make modifications in the moment
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is well suited to anyone needing to use collaboration between companies companies and vendors companies and customers etc this really is meant for b2b type setups technical training quarterly meetings etc do not recommend this as replacement for an in house instant messaging collaboration platform skype for business or slack even with ad integration the product doesn stack up against the other two like the fact that the product sticks to what it good at and doesn try to be everything to everyone
label: negative

Reviews: when the need is to see others screens or show your screen gotomeeting is perfectly suited screenshots and walkthroughs are just not enough being able to show exactly what is happening is the real need that gotomeeting fulfills that where gotomeeting shines when just doing conference call without screen share it not as appropriate as most people would need to download the application to use it
label: negative

Reviews: goto meeting was well suited for screen sharing and audio conversation the video chat issue was really problem if too many of us in the office would try to show our faces on screen during the same meeting it would severely lag and we would have issues seeing each other
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting gives users the ability to bring people together from anywhere into single environment by being able to screen share and pass off presenter responsibilities it has the potential to be very interactive and productive sometimes more productive than actually being in the same room at the same time
label: negative

Reviews: finalizing project details is where gotomeeting really shines and is the most beneficial for our usage allowing us to have frequent meetings putting them together even at the last minute and working out details between ourselves and client is huge time saver where it isn as useful and this isn a flaw of gotomeeting but when working to land new client in person meetings tend to show higher rate of securing the project than online meetings once that personal link is established then gotomeeting is great
label: negative

Reviews: i like gotomeeting for video conferencing and conference calls like it for screen sharing as well but not necessarily collaboration think it works really well within an organization with multiple offices or job sites and if set up well video conferencing in these instances is particularly easy getting video conferencing from external users has been challenge and most just call in even though there are digital audio and video obviously available this may be simple end user preference on their end however we just really find that internal meetings where we can look face to face with folks in another location make working together much more smooth
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is great if you have large team and you re always needing to be in touch if you don speak to clients on daily basis either that biweekly or monthly then gotomeeting sounds too expensive if you do not need to use such quality service then chances are you will find more affordable outlet online
label: negative

label: negative

Reviews: if adopted by an entire department or user group it works well as support and training for the entire group is efficient if you have meetings with mixture of technologies joining the meeting phone computer audio with video computer with phone gotomeeting bridges seamlessly video quality is excellent users are very impressed with the jump up in quality form free platforms skype google chat etc
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is suitable for users that want the option to meet with clients or customers without having to meet in person as large software company we aren in the same city let alone the same state as most of our customers so it important for us to have platform that can allow for more personalized one on one meetings if you are working locally and often want to meet with clients in person this software is not good fit there wouldn be purpose to it
label: negative

Reviews: my main issue with gotomeeting is the lack of reliability lot of their features are really nice especially on the recording side the problem is that none of those features matter if the core of the product the meeting itself is having issues if my audio is delayed by couple of seconds it leads to lot of awkward silences and people accidentally interrupting each other when m setting up meeting in conference room should just be able to come in and click button to get going
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is great option for having to meet with clients or to show them your screen since end users are not forced to download client and can join from any web browser it works well for inviting customers in secure locations or who don have the rights to download applications to their computer it does an alright job for supporting customers but there are better options to control the customer computer from afar
label: negative

Reviews: i highly recommend gotomeeting it a great tool for meetings webinars training etc think it great that people in different locations can still collaborate and hold meetings whether just audio with slides or face time like meetings given the current events with covid 19 it especially important to be able to have these interactions without actually coming into contact with someone
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is well suited if you need to record screen share session or collaboration conversation to connect people in multiple geographic locations to do video conferencing for business meetings and to share documents when doing any collaboration you also have change window to share additional comments it allows large meetings to occur across different rooms if required
label: negative

Reviews: i think gotomeeting is perfectly suited for large teams that need to be able to have consistent forum to offer to clients to connect with the flexibility to record and screen share it makes life so much easier for cs teams that work with clients on regular daily basis it is the perfect easy to use solution to connect with clients and be able to provide robust experience to your audience outside of regular phone call
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is in my experience best used when we have to share our work with someone else we can easily share our screen to show how the work is being done or if we need to know anything we can let anyone in the conference be presenter and play his part
label: positive

Reviews: i can think of many scenarios where it would be inappropriate have used it for board meetings end user training sessions recordings so future staff can reference it for learning and m sure m missing others on the fly meetings are pretty simple so you can share screens and troubleshoot problems
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is great tool it can also be suitable for meetings with partners or customers that you are trying to show your products or walk through contract or proposal not sure it beneficial for just conference call especially with how cell phones can accommodate multiple people these days but if you need to see the same thing or each other this is perfect
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is well suited for growing companies that need tool to showcase their software platform whether it inside sales outside sales or customer success it a quality product to use also for those logging in its web based capabilities are great for clients on the go overall great sales product can speak to how it used by operations as much would assume for group meetings

Reviews: it definitely gets the job done but honestly our clients aren big fans of gtm due to how agressively gtm pushes people to download the application instead of just using web browser version our internal team likes it and has found it easy to hop into rooms and talk with one another about projects
label: negative

Reviews: my organization really likes gotomeeting our sales team gives lot of sales presentations through the software and they comment on how 99 of the companies they are presenting to are already familiar with the look and feel of gotomeeting we have found the app to work really well on mobile as well
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting offers flexibility in video conferencing where each person can share their work and take control of the presentation it offers good functionality for collaboration on projects that require several individuals to handle different pieces of the project and then come together share their work and make modifications in the moment
label: negative

Reviews: gotomeeting is well suited to anyone needing to use collaboration between companies companies and vendors companies and customers etc this really is meant for b2b type setups technical training quarterly meetings etc do not recommend this as replacement for an in house instant messaging collaboration platform skype for business or slack even with ad integration the product doesn stack up against the other two like the fact that the product sticks to what it good at and doesn try to be everything to everyone
label: negative

Reviews: when the need is to see others screens or show your screen gotomeeting is perfectly suited screenshots and walkthroughs are just not enough being able to show exactly what is happening is the real need that gotomeeting fulfills that where gotomeeting shines when just doing conference call without screen share it not as appropriate as most people would need to download the application to use it
label: negative

Reviews: goto meeting was well suited for screen sharing and audio conversation the video chat issue was really problem if too many of us in the office would try to show our faces on screen during the same meeting it would severely lag and we would have issues seeing each other
label: negative

label: negative

Reviews: finalizing project details is where gotomeeting really shines and is the most beneficial for our usage allowing us to have frequent meetings putting them together even at the last minute and working out details between ourselves and client is huge time saver where it isn as useful and this isn a flaw of gotomeeting but when working to land new client in person meetings tend to show higher rate of securing the project than online meetings once that personal link is established then gotomeeting is great
label: negative

Reviews: i like gotomeeting for video conferencing and conference calls like it for screen sharing as well but not necessarily collaboration think it works really well within an organization with multiple offices or job sites and if set up well video conferencing in these instances is particularly easy getting video conferencing from external users has been challenge and most just call in even though there are digital audio and video obviously available this may be simple end user preference on their end however we just really find that internal meetings where we can look face to face with folks in another location make working together much more smooth
label: negative

Reviews: although zoom provides quality product and would normally give higher rating than did zoom lacks in billing and customer support zoom has focused on the onslaught of its privacy issues and has diverted its attention to this issue in doing so users that have issues with subscriptions are left fending for themselves billing and customer support are lacking and users are faced with emails that go unanswered when attempting to call in long waits of being placed on hold occur only to be answered by their answering service with the recent onslaught of online needs the business practices of zoom have failed numerous accounts of someone having paid for business or pro account has ended up reverting down to basic subscription this reversion results in numerous problems one of which is the inability to hold meetings longer than 40 minutes
label: negative

Reviews: for now due to its tools it has been the best for video conferences and calls
label: negative

Reviews: very good for sales marketing and onboarding training calls with screen shares where you need reliability and ease of use and to keep recording of the session less suited for product demos which will be disseminated by email it is not hosting editing tool
label: negative

label: negative

Reviews: zoom is well suited for companies and organizations that need to meet with clients or coworkers on consistent basis in particular great feature of zoom is if you have very large group you can break the group into smaller teams to have mini conversations and then bring back the entire group it is less appropriate if you just need to do some video conferencing for fun zoom is also great if someone can make meeting because you can record your call
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is perfect for one on one discussion with individuals who work remotely it allows you to see someone face to face in meeting without the expense of flying or driving for the meeting it allows for visual interaction and display of information in way that is very simple and easy
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is well suited for group meetings and group work also for one to one meetings with team members or relevant stakeholders it also useful if you don want to share your phone number to chat for example via whatsapp the meeting can take place via zoom with just email meeting id etc
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is the most suitable when yours is saas business and you have clients all over the world instead of wasting time and money on having face to face meetings it is much better if you have high quality video calls but if you want to create personal relationships of course don compromise meeting your client in person
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is well suited if you want to work from home and stay in touch with colleagues or if you want to communicate with friends all over the world zoom is less appropriate to use when lot of participants wants to join the meeting sometimes the app can crash or stop the meeting but this has only happened once before
label: negative

label: negative

label: negative

label: negative

label: negative

Reviews: zoom is perfect for one on one discussion with individuals who work remotely it allows you to see someone face to face in meeting without the expense of flying or driving for the meeting it allows for visual interaction and display of information in way that is very simple and easy
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is well suited for group meetings and group work also for one to one meetings with team members or relevant stakeholders it also useful if you don want to share your phone number to chat for example via whatsapp the meeting can take place via zoom with just email meeting id etc

label: negative

Reviews: zoom is well suited for companies and organizations that need to meet with clients or coworkers on consistent basis in particular great feature of zoom is if you have very large group you can break the group into smaller teams to have mini conversations and then bring back the entire group it is less appropriate if you just need to do some video conferencing for fun zoom is also great if someone can make meeting because you can record your call
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is perfect for one on one discussion with individuals who work remotely it allows you to see someone face to face in meeting without the expense of flying or driving for the meeting it allows for visual interaction and display of information in way that is very simple and easy
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is well suited for group meetings and group work also for one to one meetings with team members or relevant stakeholders it also useful if you don want to share your phone number to chat for example via whatsapp the meeting can take place via zoom with just email meeting id etc
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is the most suitable when yours is saas business and you have clients all over the world instead of wasting time and money on having face to face meetings it is much better if you have high quality video calls but if you want to create personal relationships of course don compromise meeting your client in person
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is well suited if you want to work from home and stay in touch with colleagues or if you want to communicate with friends all over the world zoom is less appropriate to use when lot of participants wants to join the meeting sometimes the app can crash or stop the meeting but this has only happened once before
label: negative

Reviews: i think zoom provides lot of flexibility and it is reasonably priced think it is good for doing online presentations both as the person presenting and the person watching the features of asking survey questions and breakout rooms are very helpful if you are using it for online instruction
label: negative

Reviews: very well suited when single person is speaking at time very well suited for when you need to discuss something that requires visual feedback great for feeling connected to others when working together remotely completely unusable for choir with multiple people trying to sing from multiple remote locations
label: negative

Reviews: i have had the opportunity to use zoom both at work and in graduate school zoom was great tool to use to meet with my classmates when we were working on group projects to be able to have those conversations in real time was very beneficial it has also proven very helpful to bring training into our school district it has allowed us to decrease expenses to bring in trainers to implement new programs
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is great for scheduling meetings through google chrome love the integration there the app screen shares well and ve had very little problems with using zoom having the meeting link in the google calendar app is godsend ve had few wires crossed while using the app in which needed to generate new meeting links
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is great tool for holding important meetings not everyone can always be present at the company so it helped us lot there are some institutions that we are still unable to make clear by video calls requiring human contact for better understanding and explanation of work things
label: negative

Reviews: zoom is very important for sales sales are personal you have to gain trust from your prospect to be successful salesperson being able to see the person you are presenting to allows you to build immediate rapport you both become real people and there now human element to this conversation over technology you can also see if your prospect is engaged or bored much easier to pick up on buying signs by being able to see your connection
label: negative

Reviews: although zoom provides quality product and would normally give higher rating than did zoom lacks in billing and customer support zoom has focused on the onslaught of its privacy issues and has diverted its attention to this issue in doing so users that have issues with subscriptions are left fending for themselves billing and customer support are lacking and users are faced with emails that go unanswered when attempting to call in long waits of being placed on hold occur only to be answered by their answering service with the recent onslaught of online needs the business practices of zoom have failed numerous accounts of someone having paid for business or pro account has ended up reverting down to basic subscription this reversion results in numerous problems one of which is the inability to hold meetings longer than 40 minutes
label: negative
